moTa: The Lotus Evora 400 is available as a coupe. The 2017 Evora 400 starts at $89,900 (MSRP), with a destination charge of $1,885. It gets EPA-estimated 19 MPG combined. The Lotus Evora 400 competes against models like the BMW 650, Jaguar F-TYPE, and Porsche 911. The Evora 400 is a good fit for luxury shoppers Luxury vehicles include all models from dedicated luxury brands plus luxurious models selected by our editors. .
